desc: Deletes a pending scheduled message from the queue.

token.desc: Authentication token bearing required scopes. Tokens should be passed as an HTTP Authorization header or alternatively, as a POST parameter.

as_user.desc: Pass true to delete the message as the authed user with `chat:write:user` scope. Bot users in this context are considered authed users. If unused or false, the message will be deleted with `chat:write:bot` scope.

channel.desc: The channel the scheduled_message is posting to

channel_not_found.desc: The `channel` passed is either an invalid ID or does not exist.

invalid_scheduled_message_id.desc: The `scheduled_message_id` passed is either an invalid ID, or the scheduled message it's referencing has already been sent or deleted.

error.description: Typical error response if no message is found
